Package com.javan.dev

Class JsonReader

java.lang.Object
com.javan.dev.JsonReader
public class JsonReader extends Object
Main back-end class used with the reading of JSON data and any other JSON-related applications.
Since:
: 1.0
Version:
: 1.1
Author:
: Brad McGlynn [bmcglyn4@uwo.ca], Dylan Sta Ana [dstaana@uwo.ca], Deep Ashishkumar Shah [dshah228@uwo.ca]
